title: New Quotation Received
message: Transfarma submitted a quotation for HPLC Columns. The quotation includes detailed pricing for 50 units of HPLC columns with 2-year warranty and technical support.

title: Purchase Order Approved
message: PO-2024-001 has been approved by finance team. The purchase order for laboratory equipment has been processed and vendor has been notified for shipment.

title: Shipment Delayed
message: SH-2024-001 is experiencing delays due to severe weather conditions affecting the shipping route. Expected delay of 2-3 business days.

title: Vendor Registration Complete
message: New vendor Merck has been successfully registered and approved. All documentation has been verified and vendor is now active in the system.

title: Tender Deadline Approaching
message: Tender T-2024-003 for laboratory equipment closes in 2 days. Please ensure all required documentation is submitted before the deadline.

title: System Maintenance Scheduled
message: System will be under maintenance on Sunday from 2AM to 4AM EST. All users will be logged out during this period. Please save your work before the maintenance window.

title: Payment Failed
message: Payment for PO-2024-002 failed due to insufficient funds in the designated account. Please update payment method or add funds to complete the transaction.

title: New Vendor Application
message: PharmaCorp has submitted a vendor application for pharmaceutical supplies. Application includes all required documentation and certifications.

title: Quality Inspection Passed
message: Quality inspection for batch QC-2024-001 has passed all tests. Products are approved for shipment and distribution.

title: Contract Renewal Reminder
message: Contract with Transfarma expires in 30 days. Please review terms and initiate renewal process to avoid service interruption.
